FCREPO-1151: Add support for getting value of method parameters in fedora-client-messaging

Adds message interfaces per gist:3513264 and discussion on fcrepo-user

AtomApimMessage now implements the ApimMessage interface.
Test case added for getMethodParamVal() to AtomApimMessageTest.
